statements.statement: INSERT INTO TT_PUR_CHUNGTUCHITIET (CHUNGTU_ID,HANGHOA_ID,MAHANGHOA,TENHANGHOA,DONVITINH_ID,TENDONVITINH,LOAI_ID,TENLOAI,SOLUONGYEUCAU,MOTA,THUONGHIEU,KICHTHUOC,VATLIEU,GHICHU, [FILE_NAME],FULLPATHSERVER,FULLPATHLOCAL,SIZE,FILE_NAME_PR,FULLPATHSERVER_PR,FULLPATHLOCAL_PR,FILE_NAME_PO,FULLPATHSERVER_PO,FULLPATHLOCAL_PO,SIZE_PO, STATE_CODE,STATE_NAME,NGUOIDUYET_ID,TENNGUOIDUYET,NGAYGIODUYET,MACHONGIA,TENCHONGIA,DONGIA,TYLEVAT,GIATRIVAT,DONGIASAUVAT,THANHTIEN,NHACUNGCAP_ID,TENNHACUNGCAP,DONGIAHOPDONG,TUNGAYHOPDONG,DENNGAYHOPDONG,GIAHOPDONG_ID,GIAHOPDONGCHITIET_ID,MATONGHOP, CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID,MALOAIPHIEU,BAOHANHTUNGAY,BAOHANHDENNGAY,TENNGUOITAO,BENHVIEN_ID,NGAYTAO,NGUOITAO_ID,SOLUONGTON) VALUES (#CHUNGTU_ID#,#HANGHOA_ID#,#MAHANGHOA#,#TENHANGHOA#,#DONVITINH_ID#,#TENDONVITINH#,#LOAI_ID#,#TENLOAI#,#SOLUONGYEUCAU#,#MOTA#,#THUONGHIEU#,#KICHTHUOC#,#VATLIEU#,#CT_GHICHU#, #FILE_NAME#,#FULLPATHSERVER#,#FULLPATHLOCAL#,#SIZE#,#FILE_NAME_PR#,#FULLPATHSERVER_PR#,#FULLPATHLOCAL_PR#,#FILE_NAME_PO#,#FULLPATHSERVER_PO#,#FULLPATHLOCAL_PO#,#SIZE_PO#,#CT_STATE_CODE#,#CT_STATE_NAME#,#CT_NGUOIDUYET_ID#,#CT_TENNGUOIDUYET#,#CT_NGAYGIODUYET#,#MACHONGIA#,#TENCHONGIA#,#DONGIA#,#TYLEVAT#,#GIATRIVAT#,#DONGIASAUVAT#, #THANHTIEN#,#CT_NHACUNGCAP_ID#,#CT_TENNHACUNGCAP#,#DONGIAHOPDONG#,#TUNGAYHOPDONG#,#DENNGAYHOPDONG#,#GIAHOPDONG_ID#,#GIAHOPDONGCHITIET_ID#,#MATONGHOP#,#CHUNGTUTONGHOP_ID#,#MALOAIPHIEU#,#BAOHANHTUNGAY#,#BAOHANHDENNGAY#,#ACCOUNTNAME#,#BENHVIEN_ID#,GETDATE(),#ACCOUNTID#,#SOLUONGTON#) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()

select DISTINCT 0 AS CHON,CT.CHUNGTU_ID,CT.MACHUNGTU,CT.NGAYLAPCHUNGTU,CT.NGAYGIOLAPCHUNGTU,CT.PROCESS_CODE,CT.PROCESS_NAME,CT.STATE_CODE,CT.STATE_NAME,CT.PHONGBAN_ID, CT.TENPHONGBAN,CT.NGUOIDUYETCAP1_ID,CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP1,CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP1,CT.NGUOIDUYETCAP2_ID,CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP2,CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP2,CT.NGUOIDUYETCAP3_ID, CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP3,CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP3,CT.CAPDUYET,CT.THOIGIANGIAOHANG,CT.NHACUNGCAP_ID,CT.TENNHACUNGCAP,CT.HINHTHUCGIAOHANG,CT.HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN,CT.TONGTIEN,CT.GHICHU,CT.DIENGIAI, CT.TENNGUOITAO,CT.TENNGUOICAPNHAT,CT.NGUOIPHANCONG_ID,CT.TENNGUOIPHANCONG,CT.NGAYPHANCONG,CT.NGAYCHAPNHAN,CT.NGAYTUCHOI,CT.THANHTOAN1,CT.THANHTOAN2,CT.THANHTOAN3,CT.THANHTOAN4, CT.THANHTOAN5,CT.THANHTOAN6,CT.BENHVIEN_ID,CT.NGAYTAO,CT.NGUOITAO_ID,CT.NGAYCAPNHAT,CT.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID, (CASE WHEN CT.STATE_CODE='3' THEN N'Đã duyệt bởi '+CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP1 ELSE CASE WHEN CT.STATE_CODE='4' THEN N'Đã từ chối bởi '+CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP1 ELSE CT.STATE_NAME END END) AS TRANGTHAI, PR.MATONGHOP from TT_PUR_CHUNGTU CT INNER JOIN TT_PUR_CHUNGTUCHITIET CTCT ON CT.CHUNGTU_ID=CTCT.CHUNGTU_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT YY.MATONGHOP FROM TT_PUR_CHUNGTU XX INNER JOIN TT_PUR_CHUNGTUCHITIET YY ON XX.CHUNGTU_ID=YY.CHUNGTU_ID WHERE XX.PROCESS_CODE='PR' AND XX.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
YY.MATONGHOP = '$MACHUNGTU$'
) PR ON CT.MACHUNGTU=PR.MATONGHOP where CT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND CT.PHONGBAN_ID IN ($LISTPHONGBANID$)
CONVERT(DATE,CT.NGAYLAPCHUNGTU) BETWEEN '$TUNGAY$' AND '$DENNGAY$'
CT.PROCESS_CODE='$PROCESS_CODE$'
CT.NGUOITAO_ID='$NGUOITAO_ID$'
CT.MACHUNGTU LIKE '%' + #MACHUNGTU# + '%'
CT.PHONGBAN_ID='$PHONGBAN_ID$'
ORDER BY CT.NGAYLAPCHUNGTU

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CT.CHUNGTU_ID) as STT, CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP1,(CASE WHEN CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP1 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP2 IS NOT NULL THEN N'Đã duyệt' ELSE CASE WHEN CT.STATE_CODE NOT IN('4') THEN N'Đã duyệt' ELSE N'Từ chối' END END END) AS TRANGTHAI1, CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP1,CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP2,(CASE WHEN CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP3 IS NOT NULL THEN N'Đã duyệt' ELSE CASE WHEN CT.STATE_CODE NOT IN('4') THEN N'Đã duyệt' ELSE N'Từ chối' END END END) AS TRANGTHAI2,CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP2,CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP3,(CASE WHEN CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP3 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP2 IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE CASE WHEN CT.STATE_CODE NOT IN('4') THEN N'Đã duyệt' ELSE N'Từ chối' END END END) AS STATE_NAME,CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP3 from TT_PUR_CHUNGTU CT where CT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND CT.PROCESS_CODE='$PROCESS_CODE$' AND CT.MACHUNGTU='$MACHUNGTU$'

SELECT DISTINCT 0 AS CHON , CT.CHUNGTU_ID , CT.MACHUNGTU , CT.NGAYLAPCHUNGTU , CT.NGAYGIOLAPCHUNGTU , CT.PROCESS_CODE , CT.PROCESS_NAME , CT.STATE_CODE , CT.STATE_NAME , CT.PHONGBAN_ID , CT.TENPHONGBAN , CT.NGUOIDUYETCAP1_ID , CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP1 , CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP1 , CT.NGUOIDUYETCAP2_ID , CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP2 , CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP2 , CT.NGUOIDUYETCAP3_ID , CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP3 , CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP3 , CT.CAPDUYET , CT.THOIGIANGIAOHANG , CT.NHACUNGCAP_ID , CT.TENNHACUNGCAP , CT.HINHTHUCGIAOHANG , CT.HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN , CT.TONGTIEN , CT.GHICHU , CT.DIENGIAI , CT.LYDOTUCHOINHAN , CT.TENNGUOITAO , CT.TENNGUOICAPNHAT , ISNULL(ISNULL(CT.NGUOIPHANCONG_ID,PC.NHANVIENPHANCONG_ID),0) AS NGUOIPHANCONG_ID, ISNULL(CT.TENNGUOIPHANCONG, '' ) AS TENNGUOIPHANCONG, ISNULL(CT.NGAYPHANCONG,ISNULL(CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP3, ISNULL(CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP2, CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP1))) AS NGAYPHANCONG, CT.NGAYCHAPNHAN , CT.NGAYTUCHOI , CT.THANHTOAN1 , CT.THANHTOAN2 , CT.THANHTOAN3 , CT.THANHTOAN4 , CT.THANHTOAN5 , CT.THANHTOAN6 , CT.MALOAIPHIEU , ( CASE WHEN CT.MALOAIPHIEU = 'DP' THEN N'Dược phẩm' ELSE CT.TENLOAIPHIEU END ) AS TENLOAIPHIEU , CT.BENHVIEN_ID , CT.NGAYTAO , CT.NGUOITAO_ID , ISNULL(CT.NGAYCAPNHAT,CT.NGAYTAO) AS NGAYCAPNHAT , CT.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID , ( CASE WHEN CT.STATE_CODE = '3' THEN N'Đã duyệt bởi ' + ISNULL(CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP3, ISNULL(CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP2,CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP1)) ELSE CASE WHEN CT.STATE_CODE = '4' THEN N'Đã từ chối bởi ' + ISNULL(CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP3, ISNULL(CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP2,CT.TENNGUOIDUYETCAP1)) ELSE CASE WHEN CT.STATE_NAME = 'LapPhieu' THEN N'Lập phiếu' ELSE CT.STATE_NAME END END END ) AS TRANGTHAI , PO.MATONGHOP , DT.MACHUNGTU AS MACHUNGTUDUOC, NGAYGIODUYETCAP = ISNULL(CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP3, ISNULL(CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP2, CT.NGAYGIODUYETCAP1)) , CASE WHEN CT.MALOAIPHIEU != 'DP' THEN NULL ELSE KHO.TENKHO END AS KHODUOC , CT.TENPHONGBAN AS PHONGBAN FROM TT_PUR_CHUNGTU CT LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT PK.KHODUOC_ID,PK.PHONGBAN_ID,PHONG.TENPHONGBAN,DT.MACHUNGTUMUAHANG,DT.MACHUNGTU FROM TT_DUOC_DUTRU DT JOIN TM_PHONGBAN_KHODUOC PK ON PK.KHODUOC_ID = DT.KHONHAP_ID JOIN TM_PHONGBAN PHONG ON PHONG.PHONGBAN_ID = PK.PHONGBAN_ID ) DT ON DT.MACHUNGTUMUAHANG = CT.MACHUNGTU AND DT.PHONGBAN_ID=CT.PHONGBAN_ID LEFT JOIN TM_KHODUOC KHO ON KHO.KHODUOC_ID = DT.KHODUOC_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT YY.MATONGHOP FROM TT_PUR_CHUNGTU XX INNER JOIN TT_PUR_CHUNGTUCHITIET YY ON XX.CHUNGTU_ID=YY.CHUNGTU_ID WHERE XX.PROCESS_CODE='PO' AND XX.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
YY.MATONGHOP = '$MACHUNGTU$'
) PO ON CT.MACHUNGTU=PO.MATONGHOP LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT PCT.CHUNGTU_ID, PLOAI.NHANVIENPHANCONG_ID FROM TT_PUR_CHUNGTUCHITIET PCT JOIN TM_PUR_LOAI PLOAI ON PCT.LOAI_ID = PLOAI.ID
WHERE PCT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND ISNULL(PLOAI.NHANVIENPHANCONG_ID, 0) > 0 )PC ON CT.CHUNGTU_ID = PC.CHUNGTU_ID
where CT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
CT.PROCESS_CODE='$PROCESS_CODE$'
CT.STATE_CODE in($STATE_CODE$) AND CT.MACHUNGTUPOMOI IS NULL
CT.PHONGBAN_ID='$PHONGBAN_ID$'
CT.NGUOITAO_ID='$NGUOITAO_ID$'
CT.NGUOIPHANCONG_ID='$NGUOIPHANCONG_ID$'
and CT.NGUOIPHANCONG_ID is not null
CT.MACHUNGTU LIKE '%' + #MACHUNGTU# + '%'
CONVERT(DATE,CT.NGAYLAPCHUNGTU) BETWEEN '$TUNGAY$' AND '$DENNGAY$'
(PHONG.PHONGBAN_ID=#PHONGBAN_OPTION# OR CT.PHONGBAN_ID = #PHONGBAN_OPTION#)
KHO.KHODUOC_ID=#KHODUOC_OPTION#

SELECT G.TUNGAY,G.DENNGAY, GC.SOLUONG, SUM(ISNULL(CCT.SOLUONGYEUCAU, 0)) AS SOLUONGYEUCAU, (GC.SOLUONG - SUM(ISNULL(CCT.SOLUONGYEUCAU, 0))) AS SOLUONGCONLAI, (SELECT VALUE FROM TM_SYS_APPSETTINGS WHERE CODE = 'PUR_CANHBAOHETHANGHOA') as SLCANHBAO, (SELECT VALUE FROM TM_SYS_APPSETTINGS WHERE CODE = 'PUR_CANHBAOHETHANHOPDONG') as DateCANHBAO FROM TM_PUR_GIAHOPDONG AS G INNER JOIN TM_PUR_GIAHOPDONGCHITIET AS GC ON GC.GIAHOPDONG_ID = G.GIAHOPDONG_ID AND GC.BENHVIEN_ID = G.BENHVIEN_ID LEFT JOIN TT_PUR_CHUNGTUCHITIET CCT ON CCT.GIAHOPDONG_ID = G.GIAHOPDONG_ID AND CCT.HANGHOA_ID = GC.HANGHOA_ID And CCT.BENHVIEN_ID = G.BENHVIEN_ID WHERE G.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND G.GIAHOPDONG_ID = '$GIAHOPDONG_ID$' AND GC.HANGHOA_ID = '$HANGHOA_ID$' GROUP BY G.TUNGAY,G.DENNGAY, GC.SOLUONG
statements.insert: INSERT INTO TM_PUR_DINHKEMHOPDONG ([GIAHOPDONG_ID],[NHACUNGCAP_ID] ,[ORIGINAL_NAME],[UPLOAD_NAME] ,[UPLOAD_FOLDER],[LOCAL_FOLDER] ,[TYPE],[SIZE] ,[BENHVIEN_ID],[NGAYTAO] ,[NGUOITAO_ID]) VALUES (#GIAHOPDONG_ID#,#NHACUNGCAP_ID# ,#ORIGINAL_NAME#,#UPLOAD_NAME# ,#UPLOAD_FOLDER#,#LOCAL_FOLDER# ,#TYPE#,#SIZE# ,#BENHVIEN_ID#,#NGAYTAO# ,#NGUOITAO_ID# ) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() as value
statements.update: UPDATE TM_PUR_DINHKEMHOPDONG SET ORIGINAL_NAME = #ORIGINAL_NAME#, UPLOAD_NAME = #UPLOAD_NAME#, UPLOAD_FOLDER = #UPLOAD_FOLDER#, LOCAL_FOLDER = #LOCAL_FOLDER#, TYPE = #TYPE#, SIZE = #SIZE#, BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where FILE_ID = '$FILE_ID$' AND GIAHOPDONG_ID = '$GIAHOPDONG_ID$' AND NHACUNGCAP_ID = '$NHACUNGCAP_ID$' AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
statements.statement: delete from TM_PUR_DINHKEMHOPDONG where FILE_ID = '$FILE_ID$'
delete from TM_PUR_DINHKEMHOPDONG where GIAHOPDONG_ID = '$GIAHOPDONG_ID$'

select FILE_ID,GIAHOPDONG_ID,NHACUNGCAP_ID,ORIGINAL_NAME ,UPLOAD_NAME,UPLOAD_FOLDER,LOCAL_FOLDER,TYPE,SIZE,BENHVIEN_ID,NGAYTAO,NGUOITAO_ID From TM_PUR_DINHKEMHOPDONG where BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' And FILE_ID = '$FILE_ID$' Order by FILE_ID

Select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by FILE_ID) as STT, FILE_ID,GIAHOPDONG_ID,NHACUNGCAP_ID,ORIGINAL_NAME,UPLOAD_NAME,UPLOAD_FOLDER, LOCAL_FOLDER,TYPE,SIZE,BENHVIEN_ID,NGAYTAO,NGUOITAO_ID From TM_PUR_DINHKEMHOPDONG where BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' And GIAHOPDONG_ID = '$GIAHOPDONG_ID$' Order by FILE_ID
select * From TM_PUR_HANGHOA Where MA = '$MAHANGHOA$'
select * from TT_INV_CHUNGTUNHAP where CHUNGTULIENQUAN_ID in($LST_ID$) and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
